rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual cost estimates without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment discusses financial cost ('estimated the cost... was more than $1 billion'), which is treated as Neutral per rules.
The segment reports the cost of a past outbreak but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes estimated cost of past crisis, not capabilities or preparedness.
